summary: This file defines a Vue component named LanguageCard.vue, which displays a card showcasing proficiency in multiple languages, including English and Telugu.
functionality: The main functionality of this file is to provide a visually appealing and responsive card component that lists languages and their proficiency levels, enhancing the user interface of the application.
relationships: This component might be used within a larger profile or user information section of the application to display language skills.
It imports a global stylesheet (main.scss) and an icon (globe.svg), suggesting it is part of a larger project with shared styles and assets.

identified_relationships.description: LanguageCard.vue is likely referenced in index.html to be included in the main application.
LanguageCard.vue may use styles defined in tailwind.config.js for styling the language card.
LanguageCard.vue is built and served by the Vite configuration defined in vite.config.js.
